content: woven stars are very quick to knit and use less than 5 g of dk weight yarn all together they are made up of two triangles knitted flat and then woven together the finished stars measure about 9 cm across at their widest point but you can knit different sizes by using other weights of yarn knit them in two shades of one colour as i have or use a variegated yarn for a different effect you could decorate the finished stars with beads and buttons too these would be a useful contribution to a fundraising stall and you are welcome to knit them to sell to raise money for any charity all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
